Text: I am back. Many thanks for your awesome contributions. Appreciated. Be well. T.

For those in the UK, especially BT, try changing your browser to 'Opera' and run in 'Turbo' mode, lower left hand corner. It has worked for me, well so far anyway. This may also work for others who have been 'BLOCKED'. 
IT REALLY IS GOOD TO SHARE.
Be well.
